channel.title: Client HELP! PLEASE
channel.description:
When i try and use the client. I click the RUNMOPERSCAPE batch file but it gives me this error:
"java" can not be reconised as a internal or external command. Press any key to continue.
How do i stop getting this error so i can use the client to continue making my server?????
Thanks in advance.
I realise i have posted in the wrong section. But i just need some small help.

item.title: Client HELP! PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:3, topic:341549”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=437949.msg3218537#msg3218537 date=1274944610]

  1. Post in right section

  2. Post in right section

  3. Post in RIGHT SECTION
    [/quote]

  4. He didnt make this topic for you to tell him this

  5. Instead of being an annoying little brat, try to help him

  6. If your going to comment on topics, dont make them stupid like THIS ONE ^[/quote]

Agreed, but post in right section next time!

Anyways change the java you got. Edit the cmd file or open it with notepad or something else where you can write. Then edit the java and save it as the same file. Thats how you fix it

Read full topic
